Name: Kneeling spirit or deity
Description: It is difficult to determine the identity (and the function) of this beautiful statuette in grey granite; could it be the goddess Sakhmet (note the fragment of mane which embellishes the neck), or another lioness-goddess, or even one of a number of genii, which, in the later periods, were placed in the funerary chambers of tombs in order to protect the dead?
